short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, Organize & Share Your Favorite Bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabWise is a versatile application that helps you effortlessly manage your bookmarks, enabling you to save and access all your web links faster. With a clean and intuitive user interface you can find what you need without getting lost in a sea of links. The Browser extension also comes with a built-in bookmark manager, which lets you save and organize your bookmarks and categorize them with different tags. 

Install the extension and start using TabWise, it is completely Free and doesn't require an account to get started. And if you enjoy the experience and want to unlock all the features you can upgrade anytime to the Pro Plan.

With TabWise Pro Plan, you can easily organize your bookmarks, share them with a restricted community, or make them public for everyone to access.  You can create a public profile and increase your visibility by making your bookmarks public, you can showcase your interests and expertise and connect efficiently with your audience.

Try TabWise today and discover how it can help you stay on top of your bookmarks!
